verbs.description: [ARG1: Top intelligence agency officials] [V: will] brief Republican lawmakers on Thursday on a confidential FBI source who acted as an informant on the Trump presidential campaign .

[ARG0: Top intelligence agency officials] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: brief] [ARG1: Republican lawmakers] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [ARG2: on a confidential FBI source who acted as an informant on the Trump presidential campaign] .

Top intelligence agency officials will brief Republican lawmakers on Thursday on [ARG0: a confidential FBI source] [R-ARG0: who] [V: acted] [ARG1: as an informant on the Trump presidential campaign] .
